title: GRIDNETOS
author: GRIDNETOS
created_time: August 21, 2023, 12:48:25 PMLast edit: August 22, 2023, 06:42:26 AM by GRIDNETOS
content: Hello Freedom Advocates and Decentralization Enthusiasts,Exciting times are ahead. As a token of our gratitude to this thriving community, we’re thrilled to announce our airdrop for GRIDNET OS users. If you’ve been tracking our progress, you understand this is a significant step. Historically, we’ve avoided airdrops to minimize selling pressure. However, as we near our integrations with crypto exchanges, we feel it’s the ideal moment to dive in.What defines us? We represent the first successful manifestation of a decentralized operating system. Numerous peer-reviewed research papers are at your disposal, with comprehensive software access. This 0-layer project has been alive and kicking since early 2017, and now we’re marching towards exchange listings.Useful URLS:Main page - feel invited!Main page - Boot the system up in your web-browserGRIDNET Magazine - lots of tutorials and documentation available.Official Forums - self explanatory.Twitter - development described on hourly basis since early 2017Discord - main discord channelYouTube - Witness over 52TB of LIVE development streams, including from today.Telegram:GRIDNET News - Latest announcements and updates.GRIDNET Talk - General discussions.GRIDNET Dev - Developer discussions.GRIDNET Trading - Trading discussions.GRIDNET Support - Support group.Claim Your FREE GRIDNET Coins:Coins valued at 50 USDT based on the market’s opening position.Requirements:Twitter / X: follow us and retweet related TweetsIdentification: EitherMailing list ID (for subscribers)URL of an active social media profile with at least 100 followers, aged 3+ months.GRIDNET Wallet Address: Download our mobile app (iOS & Android) if you don’t have a wallet yet and share your address.Stay Connected: Join our Telegram channels for instant updates.Don’t panic if your coins aren’t immediate. Airdrops are processed in batches several times weekly.This airdrop signifies our gratitude for your trust and active participation. We’re not just sculpting a platform but redefining decentralization and freedom. There are more promotional activities on the horizon, some demanding technical proficiency. But this one’s on the house.A gentle suggestion: Consider holding onto your airdropped coins. Our relentless innovation hints at their immense potential. These coins could hold greater value than just the immediate gain. Let’s envision and shape a decentralized future!Warm Regards,The GRIDNET Team
